Character

Class EnemyCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Utility.Entity
        • Character.Character
          • Character.AttributeCharacter
            • Character.EnemyCharacter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interactable, Moveable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class EnemyCharacter
extends AttributeCharacter
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The basic enemy in the game. Can be attacked and killed. Drops items upon death which can be obtained by the player.
    Version:
    2013-02-28
    Author:
    Alexander Persson & Jimmy Svensson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
